demoText: # Type a command using one of these verbs ('help', 'take', 'look at', 'inventory', 'walkthrough')

# Include a room such as ('north', 'south', 'east', 'west', 'escape pod', 'loading dock', 'navigation control', 'station control', 'lab', 'energy generation', 'sleeping quarters', 'vr chamber', 'holding chamber')
# ex. 'Take the plant to the escape pod' or 'LOOKat th loding dock for the kyy' - spelling errors intentional!
helpText: save game -- saves the current game
loadgame -- loads a previously saved game
pick up <object> -- place object in inventory
go <direction or room> -- travel to designated room
help -- displays list of available commands
look -- displays long form description of the current room
look at <feature or object> -- describes the feature or object
examine <feature or object> -- describes the feature of object
walkthrough -- instructions on how to complete the game
